data.title: Hanoi in Literature and Cinema
data.meta_description: With more than 1000Â years of history, Hanoi is known as the city with the richest cultural traditions in Vietnam, but it has also experienced the most historical upheavals. Literature about Hanoi not only reflects this reality but also creates narratives,...
data.text: With more than 1000 years of history, Hanoi is known as the city with the richest cultural traditions in Vietnam, but it has also experienced the most historical upheavals. Literature about Hanoi not only reflects this reality but also creates narratives, collective memories about the city that are both adopted and in competition with each other. In the different historical and political contexts, Hanoi as a whole and its parts are cultural fantasies at times deeply contradictory.
